"DEFENDERS OF THE REALM",2005,12
DECIMATION Tie-In!
Something wicked this way comes to London Town and it'll take the combined strengths of the Uncanny X-Men and the New Excalibur to stop it! Part 2 (of 3)!

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
